instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A2141: What is A2141? A2141 is a model number for a 16 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2019 with EMC 3347, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01700..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Screen flickering
threads.message:
Hey, i just swaped an i9 logic board (donor MBP, drop damage) to a other case/screen. Everyting works but the screen began to flicker, on the right side its a grey bar but you can still see the desktop. So bascially i thought its a dead screen, but one time after a SMC / PRAM reset the screen worked like a charm but went back to flicker a few minutes later.

Is there something i can measure to be sure its a dead screen? <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> is not known for Flexgate Issues right?

[ATTACH]60438[/ATTACH]

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Screen flickering
